results.name: Parity of A323173: a(n) = A000035(A323173(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
xref: Parity of A323173. Characteristic function of A336119.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 07 2020
